sentences.en: A growing number of customers have been inquiring about the pending price rises.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的顾客在询问即将出现的涨价问题。

sentences.en: A man has been inquiring for you at the office.
sentences.cn: 有个人在办公室一直等着要见你.

sentences.en: All this helps children to develop an inquiring attitude to learning.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都有助于培养孩子好学爱问的态度。

sentences.en: Both Mollenhuer and Simpson turned a reserved and inquiring eye on their usually genial associate.
sentences.cn: 莫仑霍和辛浦生两个都以保留的、疑问的眼光,望着他们向来诚恳的同伴.

sentences.en: He was solicitous about lighting her cigarette and inquiring as to her comfort.
sentences.cn: 他殷勤地替她点燃了烟,问她是否舒服.

sentences.en: Her eyes fixed on him with the inquiring look that he had come to dread.
sentences.cn: 她的眼光正带着探问的神色在盯着他,这是使他变得畏惧的眼光.

sentences.en: I hear you were inquiring for me in my factory.
sentences.cn: 我听说你在我们厂里找我.

sentences.en: I'm inquiring after any information the library might have on future city planning.
sentences.cn: 我正在查阅这家图书馆可能保存的关于城市远景规划的任何资料.

sentences.en: Mr. Li is inquiring about the health insurance for overseas students.
sentences.cn: 李先生正在询问留学生健康保险的事情.

sentences.en: She opened her bright, inquiring, tortured eyes and stared at him.
sentences.cn: 她睁开那对明亮的, 盘问的, 痛苦的眼睛看着他.

sentences.en: She raised an inquiring eyebrow towards Murray.
sentences.cn: 她朝默里扬了一下眉毛，露出探询的神色。

sentences.en: She was never tired of inquiring what sorrow had his young days faded.
sentences.cn: 她一遍又一遍地探问他什么伤心事使他的青春黯然无光?

sentences.en: The police are inquiring into the murder.
sentences.cn: 警察正在调查这起谋杀案.

sentences.en: When the doctor answered the phone, Mr gilbert said he was inquiring about a certain patient, a Mr gilbert.
sentences.cn: 当医生接电话时, 吉尔伯特先生说,他是在打听一位叫吉尔伯特先生的病人.

sentences.en: While you were out, a young man rang up inquiring for you.
sentences.cn: 你出去时, 一位年青人打电话找你.

sentences.en: You'd better add a postscript on to the letter inquiring about her health.
sentences.cn: 你还是在信的末尾加几句问候她健康的话好.

words.tran_cn: 询问的；打听的；爱追究的

trans.tran_cn: 咨询的，打听的，爱追根究底的
trans.tran_en: an inquiring look or expression shows that you want to ask about something

trans.tran_cn: 打听，询问( inquire的现在分词 )
